title: Cool Kids 19
body:
Pairing: Steve Rogers x Reader!Castle

Warning: Violence. Wish of dying. Mentions of assault. Fighting. Violent past. Stabbing. Hostile anger. Dislike for being touched. Mentions of death. Breaking laws. Revenge/Payback. Defiance in school.

Characters: Steve Rogers. Bucky Barnes. Sam Wilson. Becca Barnes. Frank Castle. Luke Cage. Matt Murdock. Mary MacPherran. Amora Lorelei. Wanda Maximoff. Kaine Parker. Peter Parker. Ben Reilly.
[if you have questions about who some of these Characters are, feel free to ask]

In Crew you take an oath. You live by it everyday. In this world it’s the only religion there is. And they only have two rules.
No Couples.
Don’t Fall In Love.
Being one of the only girls in Crew is walking a thin line.
One Side. Nobody dares fuck with you.
The Other. Crew guys don’t like being threatened by a girl.
But the boys you run with, they’re your family. The only ones, but your older brother Frank. Who started a Crew in your little town and runs the largest one to the day. You protect them, they stomp anyone who touches you without permission.
You and Steve are synced. Words don’t need to be exchanged to know what the other is thinking. When he moves, you move. When you need escape, he’s the sanctuary.
The dangerous part about being in a Crew. Don’t Fall In Love, and you’re so fucked. You’re hopelessly in love. But will your secrets let you accept it? Will you ever admit to why you’re this way? Why Steve Rogers is the only person you allow to touch you?

Tag List Is Open!!

Make Sure You Read The Warning. Things get ugly from here on out. If you’re not ready for, Mentions of assault. Violence. Or vulgar sexual suggestion.
Stop reading here please and thank you.

Your foot swings up, connecting with Kaine’s chin, throwing him back into his own guys. They stumble and hit the pavement, you could feel Nat swinging behind you. You arm swings out, blade out, you feel it plant into someone’s arm, ripping it back. Your hand wet, you put your fists up, as someone comes at you.

The blow comes from the side, out of nowhere. Pain explodes throughout your face; your body follows as you follow through with the hit. Your body slams into the drive, you stifle the groan you felt. You roll pushing yourself up, half way up, a foot slams into your side, tossing you back down.

“Stay the fuck down you bitch!” Kaine shouts.

Your eyes focus as you push yourself up. Nat hit the ground close to him, her hand wraps around something. Metal flashes in the flood lights, your fist pulls back, slamming into Kaine’s crotch, he bends. Nat shoves the knife across the drive towards you, before she rolls, from a kick to the side. Your hand scrambles for the blade. Your hand closes around and another blow to the side, rolls you to your back. Your worst nightmare comes true. Kaine drops down on top of you, he’s sweating, panting and reeks like alcohol.

“You just couldn’t play along.” He chuckles, your stomach turns, your breathe coming uneven. You slam your knife into his shoulder. He screams out, rearing back, his hand lashes out, back handing you. Burst of pain across your cheek, your teeth smash together. “Bitch!” Kaine yells, before he hits you once more.

You put what energy you had left into your motions. Your hands close around his T-shirt, your knees come up, pushing into Kaine’s backside. You shove with your legs and pull with your arms, throwing Kaine up and over you. You hear his body hit the ground, before your own goes limp. You roll, attempting to push yourself up. Bright lights, your blurred vision couldn’t focus to tell you what they were. You attempt to pull your knees under you, a hand closes around your hair, shoving you back down, on to your back.

He was there, one second. The next, he was coming up and flung to the side. Your head rolled, feet stood next to you. You blink, focusing, Buck had someone pinned up against your Jeep, his fist connecting with his face over and over. Nat slumped on the ground next to it, she was attempting to push herself up. That told you to do the same, your Crew came. Two hands close around you, pulling you up, your head lulls.

“Fuck!” You knew that voice, T.

“I’m okay.” You force your head up, looking at him.

“You sure?” He asks, cupping your face.

“Go, they need help.” You nod, pushing away his hands. He nods, taking off. You stumble towards Nat, dropping to the ground, you crawl towards her.

“You good?” She asks, spitting at the drive, it’s blood not saliva.

“Just getting started. You?” You cough.

“In my prime.” She gives you a one sided smirk.

“Kaine!” Frank’s voice bellows. The whole fight comes to a stop, Steve slams someone into a car window and drops him. “You come for my kin, you attack my baby sister?!” Frank walks a small circle around Kaine, who was being held up by Luke. “I am fucking KING, YOU LITTLE BITCH!” Frank screams. Frank was amped up, his body tense, his face red, and that of something you might consider a nightmare. It was etched in murder.

“Dude, your brother.” Nat nods.

“King Fucking Kong.” You nod. She snorts.

“Eye for fucking eye.” T hisses loudly, moving in.

“Action for action.” Clint growls.

“Blood for fucking blood.” Sam, Steve and Bucky call together.

“Rules of Crew. You come for royalty, I’ll put your pathetic ass six feet under.” Frank growls.

“She came here.” Kaine mutters, drooling blood.

“Looking for me!” Ben steps into view.

“Whoa.” Nat’s eyes grow wide. “Where he come from?” She looks over at you.

“No fucking clue.” Your head sways.

“She came on non Crew business and you fucking jump her and another, unprovoked?!” Frank was red in the face.

“Pay back!” Nat calls, followed with a cough. Everyone turns to look at the two of you sitting in the drive. You swallow, pushing yourself up. You sway, but stand on your own, you could see it was killing Steve, but he knew to stay. You turn pulling Nat up with you, the two of you stand, more or less leaning on one another.

“He was warned, he knew and still followed through.” Your lips pull back glaring at Kaine.

“Don’t forget the comments.” Nat licks her lips. Your eyes sink closed.

“Comments?” Luke growls. Nat nods, pushing forward she manages to walk towards Frank, Kaine and Luke.

“What was that about being hard, Parker?” She spits at him. Your brother was seething, your head shakes and your breathing was panicked.

“No.” Your voice cracks. Everyone turns to look at you. “This is Crew War now. You think you’re big and bad?” You straighten up, pushing your matted and blooded hair from your face. “I’m Crew royalty. You have nothing on my own.” Your good arm jesters out towards your own and Frank’s. “Payback, a debt is going to be settled. But it won’t be my brother handling it.” You step forward, ignore the searing pain in your body. “Watch your back Parker. I’m coming for you and remember two girls took you and your Crew on.” You pin Kaine with a look, he swallows.

“Throw him to his own.” Frank growls. Luke does exactly that, he tosses Kaine into the driveway like a doll. Your guys, Frank and his own are suddenly on you. Clint scoops up Nat, as she sways on her feet. You hadn’t noticed your own body was doing the same, Steve’s arms slip around you, pulling you up and off your feet.

“Fuck Y/N.” Frank hurries after Steve who was rushing towards your Jeep. T pulls open the hatch, Steve sets you down, Clint sets Nat next to you.

“Christ Y/N. You scared the fucking life out of me.” Buck growls, pushing Nat’s matted hair back, looking over her face.

“I knew you loved me under all that hair and hostility.” You smirk.

Buck lets out a breathy laugh, shaking his head. Steve stood in front of your brothers, unbothered by anyone else. He gently brushed your hair back, cupping your chin, he tips your head, looking at both sides. He glances down, and his jaw snaps shut, before he turns looking at Sam.

“Search the back of her Jeep, find me a flannel or her jacket.” His tone was seething anger. You glance down, your tank top strap was ripped, Frank sucked in a ragged breathe.

“Here.” Sam returns, holding out Steve’s flannel from the other day. Quickly Steve places it over your shoulders. Before he goes back to inspecting you.

He moved down, his hands slip over your sides, you suck in a painful breathe. He paused, there was an apologetic look in his eyes. He lifts the bottom of your shirt, you attempt to shove his hand away, but he bats your hand away. His face deepens in a frown at what he finds, he settles your shirt back down.

His eyes closed as he breathes in through his nose and out of his mouth. His head comes down, resting his forehead gently on your shoulder. You could feel the tension rolling off him, your hand comes up, moving slowly up and down his back. He gave a shutter, under your touch, you softly rest your head against his on your shoulder.

“Take them both to the hospital.” Frank clears his throat.

“Steve, drive Y/N’s Jeep.” Sam nods, he took control. “Buck get Nat into the truck. I’ll drive.” Sam nods. Crew took care of their own. Frank wouldn’t be going with, nobody but the five of you.

“Rogers.” Frank steps forward, Steve straightens up, turning to face your brother. “You’ll text me, call me with news?” Steve only nods in return. “Call me. If you don’t come home tonight, I will rip this town apart looking for you.” Frank points at you. You nod, it was all you could do.

You didn’t trust opening your mouth. Something girly might come out. You were feeling happy, giddy, your big brother had come to your defense. He was protective over you. He was the hero you needed him to be. You were happy, and that was just too girly for you.

Buck moved Nat to the truck with Sam’s help. Steve started to hold most of your weight, Ben came around, supporting your other side. They helped you into the passenger seat, Steve turns looking at Ben, he puts his hand out.

“Thank you.” Steve nods. Ben looked shocked, you knew you had to look the same. But Ben shook his hand.

“Yeah. Of course.” He nods.

“I owe you.” Steve swallowed. He pushes your door closed, walking around the Jeep.

“Stay the fuck down you bitch!” Kaine shouts.

Your eyes focus as you push yourself up. Nat hit the ground close to him, her hand wraps around something. Metal flashes in the flood lights, your fist pulls back, slamming into Kaine’s crotch, he bends. Nat shoves the knife across the drive towards you, before she rolls, from a kick to the side. Your hand scrambles for the blade. Your hand closes around and another blow to the side, rolls you to your back. Your worst nightmare comes true. Kaine drops down on top of you, he’s sweating, panting and reeks like alcohol.

“You just couldn’t play along.” He chuckles, your stomach turns, your breathe coming uneven. You slam your knife into his shoulder. He screams out, rearing back, his hand lashes out, back handing you. Burst of pain across your cheek, your teeth smash together. “Bitch!” Kaine yells, before he hits you once more.

You put what energy you had left into your motions. Your hands close around his T-shirt, your knees come up, pushing into Kaine’s backside. You shove with your legs and pull with your arms, throwing Kaine up and over you. You hear his body hit the ground, before your own goes limp. You roll, attempting to push yourself up. Bright lights, your blurred vision couldn’t focus to tell you what they were. You attempt to pull your knees under you, a hand closes around your hair, shoving you back down, on to your back.

He was there, one second. The next, he was coming up and flung to the side. Your head rolled, feet stood next to you. You blink, focusing, Buck had someone pinned up against your Jeep, his fist connecting with his face over and over. Nat slumped on the ground next to it, she was attempting to push herself up. That told you to do the same, your Crew came. Two hands close around you, pulling you up, your head lulls.

“Fuck!” You knew that voice, T.

“I’m okay.” You force your head up, looking at him.

“You sure?” He asks, cupping your face.

“Go, they need help.” You nod, pushing away his hands. He nods, taking off. You stumble towards Nat, dropping to the ground, you crawl towards her.

“You good?” She asks, spitting at the drive, it’s blood not saliva.

“Just getting started. You?” You cough.

“In my prime.” She gives you a one sided smirk.

“Kaine!” Frank’s voice bellows. The whole fight comes to a stop, Steve slams someone into a car window and drops him. “You come for my kin, you attack my baby sister?!” Frank walks a small circle around Kaine, who was being held up by Luke. “I am fucking KING, YOU LITTLE BITCH!” Frank screams. Frank was amped up, his body tense, his face red, and that of something you might consider a nightmare. It was etched in murder.

“Dude, your brother.” Nat nods.

“King Fucking Kong.” You nod. She snorts.

“Eye for fucking eye.” T hisses loudly, moving in.

“Action for action.” Clint growls.

“Blood for fucking blood.” Sam, Steve and Bucky call together.

“Rules of Crew. You come for royalty, I’ll put your pathetic ass six feet under.” Frank growls.

“She came here.” Kaine mutters, drooling blood.

“Looking for me!” Ben steps into view.

“Whoa.” Nat’s eyes grow wide. “Where he come from?” She looks over at you.

“No fucking clue.” Your head sways.

“She came on non Crew business and you fucking jump her and another, unprovoked?!” Frank was red in the face.

“Pay back!” Nat calls, followed with a cough. Everyone turns to look at the two of you sitting in the drive. You swallow, pushing yourself up. You sway, but stand on your own, you could see it was killing Steve, but he knew to stay. You turn pulling Nat up with you, the two of you stand, more or less leaning on one another.

“He was warned, he knew and still followed through.” Your lips pull back glaring at Kaine.

“Don’t forget the comments.” Nat licks her lips. Your eyes sink closed.

“Comments?” Luke growls. Nat nods, pushing forward she manages to walk towards Frank, Kaine and Luke.

“What was that about being hard, Parker?” She spits at him. Your brother was seething, your head shakes and your breathing was panicked.

“No.” Your voice cracks. Everyone turns to look at you. “This is Crew War now. You think you’re big and bad?” You straighten up, pushing your matted and blooded hair from your face. “I’m Crew royalty. You have nothing on my own.” Your good arm jesters out towards your own and Frank’s. “Payback, a debt is going to be settled. But it won’t be my brother handling it.” You step forward, ignore the searing pain in your body. “Watch your back Parker. I’m coming for you and remember two girls took you and your Crew on.” You pin Kaine with a look, he swallows.

“Throw him to his own.” Frank growls. Luke does exactly that, he tosses Kaine into the driveway like a doll. Your guys, Frank and his own are suddenly on you. Clint scoops up Nat, as she sways on her feet. You hadn’t noticed your own body was doing the same, Steve’s arms slip around you, pulling you up and off your feet.

“Fuck Y/N.” Frank hurries after Steve who was rushing towards your Jeep. T pulls open the hatch, Steve sets you down, Clint sets Nat next to you.

“Christ Y/N. You scared the fucking life out of me.” Buck growls, pushing Nat’s matted hair back, looking over her face.

“I knew you loved me under all that hair and hostility.” You smirk.

Buck lets out a breathy laugh, shaking his head. Steve stood in front of your brothers, unbothered by anyone else. He gently brushed your hair back, cupping your chin, he tips your head, looking at both sides. He glances down, and his jaw snaps shut, before he turns looking at Sam.

“Search the back of her Jeep, find me a flannel or her jacket.” His tone was seething anger. You glance down, your tank top strap was ripped, Frank sucked in a ragged breathe.

“Here.” Sam returns, holding out Steve’s flannel from the other day. Quickly Steve places it over your shoulders. Before he goes back to inspecting you.

He moved down, his hands slip over your sides, you suck in a painful breathe. He paused, there was an apologetic look in his eyes. He lifts the bottom of your shirt, you attempt to shove his hand away, but he bats your hand away. His face deepens in a frown at what he finds, he settles your shirt back down.

His eyes closed as he breathes in through his nose and out of his mouth. His head comes down, resting his forehead gently on your shoulder. You could feel the tension rolling off him, your hand comes up, moving slowly up and down his back. He gave a shutter, under your touch, you softly rest your head against his on your shoulder.

“Take them both to the hospital.” Frank clears his throat.

“Steve, drive Y/N’s Jeep.” Sam nods, he took control. “Buck get Nat into the truck. I’ll drive.” Sam nods. Crew took care of their own. Frank wouldn’t be going with, nobody but the five of you.

“Rogers.” Frank steps forward, Steve straightens up, turning to face your brother. “You’ll text me, call me with news?” Steve only nods in return. “Call me. If you don’t come home tonight, I will rip this town apart looking for you.” Frank points at you. You nod, it was all you could do.

You didn’t trust opening your mouth. Something girly might come out. You were feeling happy, giddy, your big brother had come to your defense. He was protective over you. He was the hero you needed him to be. You were happy, and that was just too girly for you.

Buck moved Nat to the truck with Sam’s help. Steve started to hold most of your weight, Ben came around, supporting your other side. They helped you into the passenger seat, Steve turns looking at Ben, he puts his hand out.

“Thank you.” Steve nods. Ben looked shocked, you knew you had to look the same. But Ben shook his hand.

“Yeah. Of course.” He nods.

“I owe you.” Steve swallowed. He pushes your door closed, walking around the Jeep.

trail.content:
Pairing: Steve Rogers x Reader!Castle

Warning: Violence. Wish of dying. Mentions of assault. Fighting. Violent past. Stabbing. Hostile anger. Dislike for being touched. Mentions of death. Breaking laws. Revenge/Payback. Defiance in school.

Characters: Steve Rogers. Bucky Barnes. Sam Wilson. Becca Barnes. Frank Castle. Luke Cage. Matt Murdock. Mary MacPherran. Amora Lorelei. Wanda Maximoff. Kaine Parker. Peter Parker. Ben Reilly.
[if you have questions about who some of these Characters are, feel free to ask]

In Crew you take an oath. You live by it everyday. In this world it’s the only religion there is. And they only have two rules.
No Couples.
Don’t Fall In Love.
Being one of the only girls in Crew is walking a thin line.
One Side. Nobody dares fuck with you.
The Other. Crew guys don’t like being threatened by a girl.
But the boys you run with, they’re your family. The only ones, but your older brother Frank. Who started a Crew in your little town and runs the largest one to the day. You protect them, they stomp anyone who touches you without permission.
You and Steve are synced. Words don’t need to be exchanged to know what the other is thinking. When he moves, you move. When you need escape, he’s the sanctuary.
The dangerous part about being in a Crew. Don’t Fall In Love, and you’re so fucked. You’re hopelessly in love. But will your secrets let you accept it? Will you ever admit to why you’re this way? Why Steve Rogers is the only person you allow to touch you?

Tag List Is Open!!

Make Sure You Read The Warning. Things get ugly from here on out. If you’re not ready for, Mentions of assault. Violence. Or vulgar sexual suggestion.

caption:
Title: Animal Deals
Pairing: Loki/Thor
Length: 16782
Tags: post-Thor (2011), slavery, hurt/comfort, Jotun!Loki, vague references to non-con (not between Thor and Loki) 
Notes: Written for the 2018 @thorkibigbang. Art by the lovely @wisterings. ♡
Summary: 

After falling from the Bifrost, Loki awakens the crowned prince of Asgard and Odin’s only son. Navigating this new world and his status as Asgard’s beloved prince grows easier and easier until a familiar figure at a slave auction brings the fantasy crumbling down.

summary: So, I finally checked out one of my recommendations on YouTube about how "Spider-Man Homecoming" was the worst movie of the...
body:
So, I finally checked out one of my recommendations on YouTube about how “Spider-Man Homecoming” was the worst movie of the entire MCU and…

Dude, typical “I’m Spider-Man’s biggest fan” guy: Then there was that so-called best friend… I won’t even bother to remember his name. Like, couldn’t they have chosen a character from the books instead of creating one???

Dude, I only know Spider-Man from the movies, one video from another YouTuber and the comics whenever Venom’s in it (cause OTP and stuff…) And even I, a total heathen, know who Ned Leeds is…

JARVIS isn’t quite sure what to make of the Winter Soldier when Captain Rogers first brings him to the tower, but he has been looking out for Sir’s best interests since his creation. title: Teuscher
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2zxi0d5

by CocoLemonJr

Steve Rogers came from a time where being ‘gay’ is frowned upon

But that is beside the point. It was common knowledge that Tony Stark went big and bold. So when Halloween came around he decided that it would be a good idea to put out a bowl of the most expensive high-quality chocolate he could find

He bit another chocolate thoughtfully

they were all gone

Tony who was smirking at him with malicious intent. He simply stated “you want it, come and get” before popping it into his mouth and trying to keep from laughing at Steve’s face.

He couldn’t help it

HOLY STARS AND STRIPES!

Steve tasted the sharp zing of Tony’s bottom lip that he realized the best tasting chocolate in the whole world was Tony’s mouth.

summary: After an absence Hasbro tried to kick start a Transformers revival (post TMNT) it didn't really succeed, and the Toyline wasn't...
caption:
After an absence Hasbro tried to kick start a Transformers revival (post TMNT) it didn’t really succeed, and the Toyline wasn’t up to it’s predecessors quality.

The tie in comic storyline was however intriguing but unfortunately only saw a truncated run released in the UK. (I eventually tracked down the USA full series a decade later!) #transformersgeneration2 #Marvel
